column1: Little Goat Diner////Our server was very pleasant
column2: but straight to the point.  He made no bones about what he recommended... and he said it with such authority
column3: that it was hard not to order much of what he suggested.  We started with the pickled onion rings
column4: which were fantastic.  We then moved to the Boo Boo Baise (mussels
column5: shrimp and whitefish). This was decent
column6: but not sure I would get it again.  We then had the hot crab dip with ritz crackers. We loved this!  We had the goat sloppy joe as well
column7: which tasted like the goat and girl and the goat.  Tasty!  We also had the trout
column8: which was fine.  We ended it with a meringue pie
